d89380ae-576d-489d-bd06-c4b4b3f5818f.description: During the Summer Leadership Institute, students will experience an array of leadership workshops ranging from team-building to self-discovery. The workshops are facilitated by professional NDSU staff as well as current NDSU students. Through SLI, students will realize strengths as a college student through participation in interactive workshops, expand leadership aptitude through experiential team-building activities, and connect to the University through the development of new relationships.
d89380ae-576d-489d-bd06-c4b4b3f5818f.name: Summer Leadership Institute

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Complete a three-day retreat focusing on leadership development topics.
Actively participate in large and small group activities that will aid in a better understanding of individual leadership development and team interaction.
Participate in experiential learning opportunities to enhance self-discovery of personal leadership style.
Gain a better understand of personal wellness and the role that wellness plays in personal success.

fbc9e2df-3b92-4c7f-b2e3-5c9f85b82965.description: The earner of this badge has demonstrated comprehension of the basics of leadership, including: leadership styles, the different roles of a leader, and supporting a team. They have identified their goals, needs, and strengths.
fbc9e2df-3b92-4c7f-b2e3-5c9f85b82965.name: Leadership 101

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Complete the one hour workshop on identifying leadership styles, strengths and needs.
Scored 80% or higher on assignment.

04a8d37b-1def-4f86-86ae-e5c9076f47ff.description: Earners of this badge have attended the Meeting Managers workshop. Participants within this workshop have learned to build, organize, and run meetings for their team or organization. This includes learning how to engage and include meeting participants, how to determine what content should be covered, and how to keep time.
04a8d37b-1def-4f86-86ae-e5c9076f47ff.name: Meeting Manager

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has attended and actively participated in the Meeting Manager workshop hosted by the Student Activities Office.
The earner has scored 80% or higher on workshop quiz.

944b8ddc-c360-4575-8262-2ab1fa3636ef.description: The badge earner has learned the basics involved in growing community organizations. They have learned how to communicate with potential organizational members; how to clearly identify an organization's mission, benefits, and optimal size; and how to retain organizational members after joining.
944b8ddc-c360-4575-8262-2ab1fa3636ef.name: Recruiting for Community Organizations

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Completed the one day workshop, consisting of two hours of in-person learning.
Score grade of at least 80% on assignment.

56f85791-791c-48c7-b7c7-012367604561.description: After earning this badge, the completer will be trained in all five modules of the Trauma Sensitive Schools curriculum including Module 1: Introduction to Childhood Trauma; Module 2: Neurobiology of Trauma & Resilience; Module 3: Trauma-Sensitive Strategies Part 1; Module 4: Trauma-Sensitive Strategies Part 2; and Module 5: Taking Care of You & The Flexible Framework.
56f85791-791c-48c7-b7c7-012367604561.name: Trauma Sensitive Schools

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate an understanding of childhood trauma.
Demonstrate an understanding of the neurobiology of trauma and resillience.
Recognize signs of trauma in students.
Know strategies for supporting students with trauma.
Know strategies for self-care and managing personal trauma.

3cbb2211-d10a-4ce3-933f-13612ee8f954.description: The badge earner has learned the basics of organizational strategy. The earner knows the importance and relationship between missions, goal, objectives and targets. They have practiced formulating organizational missions and identified meaningful, targeted activities that work towards them.
3cbb2211-d10a-4ce3-933f-13612ee8f954.name: Basics of Organizational Strategy

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Complete one workshop, consisting of 2 hours of in-person learning.
Score at least 80% on assignment.

e9becd02-1753-4dde-9308-f7da566bc0d8.description: Everyone has a different approach to leadership because of a variety of different influences. Earners of this badge have attended the Finding My Leadership Style workshop. This workshop breaks down some of the different styles of leadership, and some of the potential leadership characteristics that someone might want to use more. The earner has learned techniques that can be used to develop their desired leadership style.
e9becd02-1753-4dde-9308-f7da566bc0d8.name: Finding My Leadership Style

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Attend a one hour leadership development session.

e16a22b6-5fec-4c0c-93f8-4b6b00dbcbd8.description: The earner of this badge is able to identify content area vocabulary based upon criteria including frequency, usefulness, and need; classify target level of learning; and determine how to support learners in owning the vocabulary at the target level of learning.
e16a22b6-5fec-4c0c-93f8-4b6b00dbcbd8.name: Vocabulary Instruction

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Determine vocabulary from a text within a unit of study.
Use criteria including frequency, usefulness, and need to classify the target level of learning for the vocabulary.
Plan learning evidence-based experiences to support learners in owning the vocabulary at the target level of learning.
Plan assessment to determine learner word ownership.

70475367-7571-4fde-a606-c67c3b5f0029.description: The earner of this badge is able to analyze a text for readability using tools including a readability checker, text complexity rubric, and text features evaluation to identify the demands of the text. They can also determine reader ability using a variety of high quality assessments, and match texts to readers based upon this information, ensuring accessibility to learning for all learners.
70475367-7571-4fde-a606-c67c3b5f0029.name: Matching Texts to Readers

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Accurately and thoroughly analyze various types of content area texts.
Plan classroom assessments to determine reader ability.
Interpret standardized and common assessments to inform interpretations of reader ability.
Plan learner supports and instruction to make the text and learning accessible to all learners, including readers who struggle and English Language Learners.

f109473a-e06d-4e78-8012-5d499d1b217e.description: The earner of this badge knows the five literacy building blocks and how they interact to support decoding and meaning making for secondary level readers. These badge earners also know how to support learners' further development of the five building blocks in a secondary content classroom.
f109473a-e06d-4e78-8012-5d499d1b217e.name: Science of Reading for Secondary Educators

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Describe the five literacy building blocks and explain how they apply to secondary readers in the general education classroom.
Design learning experiences that support learners' development of the five literacy building blocks.
Design assessments to determine learner proficiency with the five literacy building blocks.
Recognize signs of a reader who struggles and when to refer a learner for possible remediation.
Plan instructional supports for readers in Tier 1 and Tier 2 of a multi-tier support system in a content area, secondary classroom.

36148397-30db-45c4-b3c6-6cb6751766b4.description: This badge earner has learned the foundations of delegation. They have learned about the role that delegation plays in both the management of tasks, and the long term development of an organization. The earner has also demonstrated the ability to identify how delegation can be used to facilitate role transitions.
36148397-30db-45c4-b3c6-6cb6751766b4.name: Introduction to Delegation for Leaders

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Completed a one hour workshop.
Successfully completed all in-class activities.

080e5616-b48c-49c4-a314-0acaa377c4b1.description: Earners of this badge have learned how to ensure that future leadership teams are well prepared to manage and run their organization. Participants have learned: when to start transitions of powers, who should be involved, what should be done, and how to create transition documents.
080e5616-b48c-49c4-a314-0acaa377c4b1.name: Transitions of Power

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has attended and actively participated in the Transition of Power workshop hosted by the Student Activities Office.
The earner has scored 80% or higher on workshop quiz.

202d7b3c-e950-4fab-9d77-6555583776dd.description: Leaders have learned how to moderate conflict between themselves and others. They have learned to apply tools and strategies to de-escalate conflict and ensure that all those involved feel heard and supported.
202d7b3c-e950-4fab-9d77-6555583776dd.name: Conflict Management

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has attended and actively participated in the Conflict Management workshop hosted by the Student Activities Office.
The earner has scored 80% or higher on workshop quiz.

21bded76-48a3-4207-8e95-d8655ea4a155.description: Recipients demonstrated entrepreneurial thinking, skills, and drive to take action. They independently explored a new market, researched customer needs, and built a business model to capture opportunities within their industry. Recipients had a growth mindset throughout the process of finding a business opportunity, completion of research and start-up activities, and written analysis. Earners completed a 4-credit, 320-hour authentic, entrepreneurial practicum experience with a grade of A+.
21bded76-48a3-4207-8e95-d8655ea4a155.name: NDSU Entrepreneur in Action Badge

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: The recipient earned an A+ for a final Entrepreneurial Practicum course grade.
The badge recipient has successfully earned 4-credits through an NDSU Entrepreneurial Practicum by completing 320 hours of an approved internship experience.
The earner completed 6 credits in Entrepreneurship Coursework to satisfy Internship Pre-requisites.
The recipient has effectively completed a final written analysis of their work experience, demonstrating valuable entrepreneurial thinking skills.

8b60bbc0-23b7-4cd0-80fc-2bba13fd6973.description: Recipients of this badge have added value to a business or internal department through the successful application of entrepreneurial sales, marketing, and brand management. This badge is reserved for students who specifically exhibit a growth mindset throughout the process of finding an internship opportunity through completion of work activities and a final written analysis. Earners have completed a 4-credit, 320-hour authentic entrepreneurial internship experience with a grade of A+.
8b60bbc0-23b7-4cd0-80fc-2bba13fd6973.name: Entrepreneurial Marketing & Sales Experience

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: The recipient earned an A+ for a final Entrepreneurial Internship course grade.
The badge recipient has successfully earned 4-credits through an NDSU Entrepreneurial Internship by completing 320 hours of an approved internship experience.
The earner completed 6 credits in Entrepreneurship Coursework to satisfy Internship Pre-requisites.
The recipient has effectively completed a final written analysis of their work experience, demonstrating valuable entrepreneurial thinking skills.
Students who are awarded this badge have a social network of NDSU faculty and alumni through the NDSU Center for Entrepreneurship, who champion their future.
It is understood that students who take the NDSU Entrepreneur Internship intend to add Minor in Entrepreneurship to their chosen University Major.

716139e6-8b7d-403d-8752-6dd43ec7cfb8.description: The badge earner has learned the basic of empathetic communication. They have learned the importance of active listening and how to use reflective language to demonstrate engagement. They understand how to use empathetic communication to support members of an organization.
716139e6-8b7d-403d-8752-6dd43ec7cfb8.name: Basics of Empathetic Communication

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Complete one workshop consisting of two hours of in-person training.
Score at least 80% on assignment.

9585d950-6697-47df-a2df-a656a64a7f5d.description: A half-day conference open to students that will examine various aspects of leadership from the perspective of student, campus, and community leaders. There will be multiple breakout sessions on topics such as organizational accountability, developing organizational Strategy, communication, diversity-related topics, and interpersonal professionalism.
9585d950-6697-47df-a2df-a656a64a7f5d.name: Bison Leadership Institute

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Attend and actively participate in the Bison Leadership Institute
Utilize the information provided in the breakout sessions to create a plan during the planning session
Engage with the other participants attending the conference

75341661-1520-4c89-b714-fa9b925fd461.description: Earners of this badge have attended the Leading with Effective Communication workshop. This session examines how effective communication can influence a person's leadership skills. They've learned key principles of effective communication that drive collaboration and organizational success. Finally, they've considered how we can develop stronger communication skills. These sessions are open to any student, faculty, or staff that wants to develop their leadership skills.
75341661-1520-4c89-b714-fa9b925fd461.name: Leading With Effective Communication

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge attended and actively participated in the Leading with Effective Communication workshop hosted by the NDSU Student Activities Office.

b750b813-6753-4935-baee-13ff4cdba9f9.description: Earners of this badge have attended the Leading with Vulnerability workshop. Leadership is about finding ways to get people to follow you, which means sometimes we have to be vulnerable and show that we are not perfect. In this session, the earner learns to reframe the idea of vulnerability and consider how vulnerability can build trust to create a sense of belonging. Finally, this workshop outlines some ways that, as a leader, you can demonstrate vulnerability to strengthen an organization.
b750b813-6753-4935-baee-13ff4cdba9f9.name: Leading with Vulnerability

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: Earners of this badge attended and actively participated in the Leading with Vulnerability workshop hosted by the NDSU Student Activities Office.

ffb20a09-3f1e-4186-b00e-01e2fb7b24b8.description: Earners of this badge have attended the Power of Gratitude workshop where they examine what gratitude is and how showing and accepting appreciation can benefit our psychological, physical, and social well-being. They've learned about the complexities of gratitude, why people struggle to show it, and how to be more accepting of gratitude. Finally, the learner has an understanding of the relationship between power and gratitude, and how appreciation can strengthen a team.
ffb20a09-3f1e-4186-b00e-01e2fb7b24b8.name: The Power of Gratitude

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has attended and participated in the Power of Gratitude workshop hosted by the Student Activities Office.

e5afa9b3-e403-43e1-bf5e-e8be208158b9.description: Earners have learned techniques to understand their own emotions, as well as how to better understand the emotions and needs of those on their teams. Participants have also learned to recognize signs of conflict.
e5afa9b3-e403-43e1-bf5e-e8be208158b9.name: Understanding Emotional Intelligence

issuer.summary: issued by North Dakota State University

badge_template_activities.title: The earner has attended and actively participated in the Understanding Emotional Intelligence workshop hosted by the Student Activities Office.
The earner has scored 80% or higher on workshop quiz.
